alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marathon, Menominee, central Oconto, southern Langlade and Shawano Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Smokey Falls, or 20 miles north of Shawano, moving east at 45 mph. Additional thunderstorms were forming to the west which will also impact the area. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antigo, Gillett, Wittenberg, Mountain, White Lake, Big Smokey Falls, Bear Paw Scout Camp, Gardner Dam Scout Camp, Legend Lake and Keshena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Oconto County
